meanings.definition: Resembling a shrew in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her shrewlike tendencies made her difficult to work with.
meanings.sent2: The cat's shrewlike movements caught the attention of the curious child.
meanings.sent3: The shrewlike way she scurried around the kitchen looking for her keys was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: His shrewlike eyes darted around the room, searching for any signs of danger.
meanings.sent5: The shrewlike grin on his face hinted at mischief brewing.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a shrew.
meanings.sent1: The old lady had a shrewlike determination to finish her crossword puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a shrewlike overgrowth of weeds that needed to be cleared.
meanings.sent3: His shrewlike stubbornness in refusing to try new foods was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The shrewlike nature of the storm wreaked havoc on the small town.
meanings.sent5: The shrewlike squeak of the rusty gate echoed through the empty field.
